faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about the generator and analysis features

questions.question: Is this a legal/official naming service?
questions.answer: No. This is an informational tool for inspiration and analysis. Always verify naming rules and local requirements.

questions.question: How accurate is BaZi/Wuge analysis?
questions.answer: We provide a transparent, algorithmic interpretation. Traditional systems vary by school and practitioner, so treat results as reference.

questions.question: Do you store the names I submit?
questions.answer: By default, no. If you enable database persistence in your deployment, this may change—see the Privacy page in your hosted site.

questions.question: Is this service free?
questions.answer: Yes, this service is completely open source and free. You can use all features freely.

questions.question: How do I choose the right Five Elements for my baby?
questions.answer: Calculate the BaZi based on your baby's birth date and time, analyze the strength of each element. Missing or weak elements need strengthening, while excessive elements need balancing.

questions.question: Can I use the generated names directly?
questions.answer: Generated names are for reference only. We recommend combining family traditions, personal preferences, and professional advice for your final decision.

questions.question: Do you support multiple languages?
questions.answer: Currently we support Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean interfaces.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: Provide name generation, analysis, and curated cultural references to support your decision-making.

whatWeDontDo.title: What We Don't Do
whatWeDontDo.description: We are not a substitute for professional, human consultation and we do not guarantee real-world outcomes.
